bug.author: wangkuiyi
bug.summary: The fraud detection notebook doesn't run
bug.description:
The first SELECT * LIMIT 5 statement runs. But the rest statements with SQLFlow syntax extensions do not run. As shown in the following figure. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1548775/73130175-0dfd9680-3fa8-11ea-96a0-9bc944902698.PNG></denchmark-link>
To reporduce this problem:
Follow the Quick Start guide in Windows to start a container. Open a Chrome and direct to localhost:8888. This opens the list of notebooks. Select the fraud detection example. Run cells one-by-one. The first runs and prints some sample data. The rest don't give any response.
Please be aware that I can run the Housing Explain example <denchmark-link:http://localhost:8888/notebooks/housing-explain.ipynb>http://localhost:8888/notebooks/housing-explain.ipynb</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: The mark [*] on the left of the SQL statements block means this block is currently still running. And, [1] means the first execution is completed. You may need to wait until the execution is finished.
